thread.title: Lincoln City discover when their dream trip to Arsenal becomes a reality as FA Cup quarter final dates are confirmed
thread.title_full: Lincoln City discover when their dream trip to Arsenal becomes a reality as FA Cup quarter final dates are confirmed

title: Lincoln City discover when their dream trip to Arsenal becomes a reality as FA Cup quarter final dates are confirmed
text:
Lincoln City discover when their dream trip to Arsenal becomes a reality as FA Cup quarter final dates are confirmed 
The Football Association, BT Sport and BBC announce full schedule for the last eight clashes BY GARY STONEHOUSE Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments THE FA Cup quarter final ties have now been confirmed with all four matches set to be screened live on TV. 
The Football Association, BT Sport and BBC have now decided on the schedule, which will take place over three days. Getty Images 5 Lincoln City’s FA Cup clash at Arsenal will be screen live on BT Sport on Saturday March 11 
The action will begin at the Riverside Stadium on Saturday March 11 when Middlesbrough welcome the winners of Manchester City ’s replay with Championship high-flyers Huddersfield next Wednesday. 
Keep up to date with ALL the FA Cup news, gossip, transfers and goals plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
BT Sport will be screening that clash live, and they will be providing a double dose of cup action that Saturday by showing the 5.30pm clash between Premier League big guns Arsenal and Conference Premier giantkillers Lincoln City. 
The BBC will take over broadcasting the cup duty the next day, screening Millwall’s visit to White Hart Lane to take on Tottenham in what promises to be an explosive London derby at 2pm. related stories Why are Man United playing their Europa League tie against Saint Etienne on a Wednesday? Hornets Buzzing Watford's summer business off to a flyer as they agree free transfer for Alaves star Kiko Femenia PREVIEW Saint-Etienne vs Manchester United: When is the Europa League tie and what TV channel is it on? Walk-ing on Water Barcelona consider shock £60m summer move for Tottenham's Kyle Walker to replace Dani Alves FRENCH TEST LIVE - St Etienne vs Man United: Jose Mourinho names strong team for last 32 second leg despite 3-0 lead on agg FA CUP QUARTER FINALS 
12.30pm, Saturday March 11, Live on BT Sport 
Arsenal vs Lincoln 
5.30pm, Saturday March 11, Live on BT Sport 
Tottenham vs Millwall 
2pm, Sunday March 12, Live on BBC One 
Chelsea vs Man United 
7.45pm, Monday Match 13, Live on BBC One 
The final quarter final will then take place on the night of Monday March 13, with the Beeb once again having the honours of bringing all the drama into our homes. 
Current holders Manchester United will travel to their manager Jose Mourinho’s former home to tackle league leaders Chelsea. 
New rules come into play in the FA Cup quarter finals this season, with all ties decided on the night. Getty Images Middlesbrough will kick off the FA Cup quarter final weekend against the victors of Manchester City and Huddersfield Getty Images FA Cup holders Manchester United will be screened live on the BBC News Group Newspapers Ltd Jose Mourinho will take his side to play Antonio Conte’s Chelsea at his former stomping ground on Monday March 13 Getty Images 5 Harry Kane and his Tottenham team-mates will welcome Millwall to the Lane on Sunday March 12 
Should any finish all-square after 90 minutes, then extra-time and penalties will be played to decide the outcome. 
Teams will also be permitted to make a fourth substitution should their match go into extra-time. 
The winning clubs will collect £360,000 from the FA prize fund, while they will all pocket £247,500 each as part of the FA live broadcast fee. Goals of the 5th Round - Watch the best strikes from the weekend FA Cup action
